H0.text: In which year did the Battle of Gettysburg take place. 1861

H1.text: In which year did the Battle of Gettysburg take place. 1864

H2.text: In which year did the Battle of Gettysburg take place. 1862

H3.text: In which year did the Battle of Gettysburg take place. 1863

A4.text: In the Battle of Gettysburg, which proved the war's bloodiest and one of its most strategically significant, Meade defeated Lee in a three-day battle between July 1 and 3, 1863.
